level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term "general supervision" means that the services of the technician are provided under the direction of a licensed veterinarian, and the veterinarian is accessible and available to the technician via a telephone communication device or on the premises.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2014 amendment by D.C. Law 20-96 added this section.
